name: Heart no Kuni no Alice - Dream's a Dream (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Pairing: Blood x Alice

name: Shitsuji Game
nutshell: Rau, the young master of a noble family, left home when his father issued an ultimatum: "get married or no inheritance!" His only ally was his faithful butler, Gai, who had been taking care of him since he was little… or at least, he'd thought as much. However, Gai hardly seemed sympathetic to Rau's plight, nor did he show any reaction to Rau confessing his love for him. Things finally came to a head when Rau was tricked into a marriage interview… Who indeed was the butler's true master…!?

name: Make wa Tada no Mahou ja nai no: Beginners
nutshell: For anyone intimidated by the world of makeup, you’re in luck--a former beauty consultant turned comic artist is here to walk you through it. Join the author as she breaks down the fundamentals of cosmetics and skin care, guided by common questions from her online followers! Learn the basics and develop your own signature style! The perfect illustrated how-to book for fans of makeup tutorials online.

name: Anti Alpha Another
nutshell: Born in the venerable family of Alpha, Shizuka Kamidai is respected as an excellent lawyer. He takes on the defense of the man, Takishima Kinji, who was accused of killing his fateful mate. The price of taking care of him without an underwriter caused a heat due to the body odor...!?

name: BanG Dream - LisaYuki à la carte (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Originally posted on the web in piecemeal, this is a cute and fluffy smorgasbord featuring Yukina and Lisa.

name: Sono Boukensha Kiken ni Tsuki
nutshell: A collection of short, comedic stories from early in Yagami's career.

name: Imouto ga kareshi o tsuretekitandaga
nutshell: A story about sister bringing home a boyfriend.

name: At 25:00, in Akasaka
nutshell:
Yuki Shirasaki finally lands a huge role in TV drama Afternoon Dreams after years of toiling in theater. With popular actor Asami Hayama as his costar, Shirasaki plays a gay character in a relationship. But, Shirasaki has zero dating experience with either men or women. Shirasaki struggles to express his character’s feelings and takes drastic measures to become a better actor.
To better embrace his new role, Shirasaki goes to a gay bar to find someone to sleep with for the experience. There, he runs into Hayama. How will Shirasaki react when Asami offers him his body?

name: Kiruza King
nutshell: Non-chan has never been able to catch up to top stylist and childhood friend Omi. Following in her father's footsteps, Non trains hard at the Jisen Sougou Beauty School. Clumsy and headstrong, will Non-chan be able to triumph as a hair stylist and find love along the way?

name: Iikoni dekitara hometekure
nutshell: Watanabe es un profesor de instituto que siempre había ocultado que era un sub, estaba tan enfadado y frustrado porque su prometida lo había dejado, que decidió conocer a un dom en una app de emparejamiento dom y sub. Sin embargo, fue su ex-alumno izumi quien termino apareciendo. Intenta huir, pero cuando Izumi lanza una ''orden'', no puede resistirse y cruza la línea ese mismo día. Además, se ve obligado a llevarse a Izumi, que dice no tener donde quedarse. No quiere ser dominado por los instintos de un Sub, pero se siente cómodo cuando Izumi lo llama ''lindo''....

name: Ichido Dake no Uta (Doujinshi)
nutshell: "Original" doujinshi by the circle NAIFU.

name: Mobuko to Moteo
nutshell:
The story of a popular guy and his friend the side character.
A spin-off of Houkago Collage Note; the oneshots were posted under the same hashtag as the oneshots that got collected and serialized, but this one did not make it into the volume.

name: Every Day Jugyou Sankan!
nutshell: Mio Yakama is an ordinary elementary school student. At least until her mother takes a rejuvenating potion and ends up going to class with her ...

name: Anata no Kiss mo Kokoro mo Zenbu
nutshell:
1-2) Kiss Returns / Anata no Kiss mo Kokoro mo Zenbu
While at work one day, Fujisawa cut his finger deeply, and ran to a crowded medical clinic. By chance, he met, for the second time, his childhood friend Kenjou, who was now a doctor at the clinic. Fujisawa still remembers being a junior high school student, and the time in the library when he had softly kissed his sleeping friend, the object of his unrequited love.


A Cat and A Gentle Guy
How will Hiroaki's life change when a crossdressing Natsumu comes across him in an argument with his girlfriend?


Cool Styles
Yukihiro Misato is currently dating Takashi Nogi. Yukihiro claims that he can't stand clingy lover's, but will Nogi be able to change that?


My Lover in a Wonderland
Naoto Kimura is Isaki Yada rather unusual neighbor.


Sweet 13 Years Later
A short extra about the first couple.

name: Boku no Jealousy Monogatari
nutshell:
From KCG Scans:
Haru, a girl that is scared of boys, encountered a beautiful girl that took her breath away. Who would have thought that she would meet her again in her new high school. But she is… a boy? What will Haru do when he confesses to her?
Haru, a quien le asustan los chicos… se encuentra con una hermosa niña que le quita el aliento. Feliz por su nueva amiga, pensó que la vería de nuevo en su nueva escuela; pero… resulta que ¿Ella en realidad es Él? ¿Qué hará Haru cuando este chico se le confiese?

name: Senpai to Kanojo
nutshell: Tsuzuki Rika has just started her high school life, hoping to have a "sweet love". But she fell in love with a senpai, who's in love with another girl… no matter how hard she tries, her love is unlikely to be returned… sweet, yet painful adolescent love.

name: Akuten Wars
nutshell:
"Akuten Wars," a game in which the players fight with devil and angel cards.
The main character is middle school student Roto. One day an angel appears in his dreams and tells him that devils are using the game to take control of the world. He thinks it's just a dream, but then a classmate who is playing the game seems like he is possessed by a demon…

name: Blue
nutshell: I can see Ghosts but there is one I cannot forget…

name: Nusutto
nutshell:
For Nusutto, every day is a new opportunity to be his name, a thief. With his partner Scotts and surrogate daughter Chiko, Nusutto gets into far-out gag-filled situations and hijinks.
Serialized in Weekly Shonen Jump, it ceased publication after 17 chapters, likely due to plagiarism of characters, style, and overall premise from Monkey Punch's Lupin III.

name: BADBOYS
nutshell:
Tsukasa Kiriki is a boy that comes from a rich family. He spends his life sheltered from the outside by his parents undetermined to change. That is until his homeschool teacher, Mrs. Michie, says something that gives him the drive to be a delinquent. These are how he spends his days as a Bousouzoku.
This manga ran for 22 volumes from 1988-1996.
Link:
AnimeNewsNetwork (anime)

name: Dolls
nutshell:
Yumiko Kawahara's disturbing short stories explore the strange and codependent world of dolls and the people who own them.
These cautionary tales must come from some desire to teach people a lesson, for in each one there is a horrible outcome when the doll enters their homes.

name: Terra ForMars Gaiden - Onizuka Keiji
nutshell: Before Annex, before Mars, there was… the not well-known trifling event of Onizuka Keiji.

name: Pokémon Fushigi no Dungeon: Honoo no Tankentai
nutshell: Manga based on Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Explorers of Time and Explorers of Darkness.

name: Maou na Ore to Fushihime no Yubiwa
nutshell:
Kusumi Chiharu gets a message one day that he has been selected as a Monster/Demon Tamer, and he is prompted to select his first partner. He thinks little of the message until he receives a giant package the following day. He assumes it's the porn books he ordered, but the huge box ends up containing the unconscious body of a mostly naked girl! She's a ghoul named Zonmi, who intends to fight with him as his partner. However, it turns out that other hot girls at his mostly-male high school are also magical creatures, and Zonmi may not be the only one who wants to fight by his side!
Adaptation of the light novel series written by Kankitsu Yusura with illustrations by Shugasuku.

name: Heavy Object
nutshell: Kwenser came to the Alaskan military base to study Objects, the new weapons that have completely revolutionized war as we know it – battles are fought by soldiers controlling Objects far away from harm. However, when he starts to get close to Object pilot Milinda, will he discover the grim truth behind Heavy Objects?

name: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Re;surrection
nutshell:
Year 2 of the Kouwa era.
A year has passed since the world has known peace at the hands of Zero, and many of the citizens of this new world have been able to find some semblance of normality.
However, that normality is threatened when terrorists start to appear, with some believing the warrior nation of Zilkhstan to be behind the disturbances.
A direct follow-up to Lelouch of the Rebellion Re; manga based on the movie of the same name, this manga also depicts events prior to the film's start, and seems to follow a similar timeline to the original anime, rather than that of the movie recaps.

name: Silent Möbius Klein
nutshell: Mobius Klein is the prequel Manga to Kia Asamiya's Silent Mobius Manga. It tells the story of how Fuyuka and Gigelf met, and introduces many characters that later appear in Silent Mobius, including; Rally Cheyenne and Ganossa Maximillian, as well as the relatives of other characters like Yamigumo Razan.

name: THE TRAVELLER
nutshell:
In a world where super powers exists and you can only get it by luck.
Humans, animals, monsters, demons, plants etc anyone can get a superpower but only by luck.
A child is born with 2 powers,people consider him incredibly lucky,being the first one in their
country ,and being one of the people with the strongest powers.
But it's nothing like that,he just wants a to eat fight and draw at his own time.
But then world won't allow him to.

name: Boyfriend
nutshell:
Takatou Masaki is the second youngest of four sons, and seemingly a delinquent by nature. His hot temper has put a wedge between himself and his strict father, gotten him kicked out of one school, and tossed him at a school notoriously horrible for the one thing he's truly good at, basketball. A chance encounter with the willful Yuuki Kanako may serve as a catalyst for change, as the indefinable connection she feels with him draws them together…


Won the Shogakukan Manga Award in 1988
